benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/block - Block a bundle

covered: POST Method: Valid Payload - Successful creation of blocking states with valid payloads (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04).
POST Method: Invalid Payload - Handling of malformed payloads and missing/invalid fields (TC08, TC09, TC10, TC11, TC19, TC20).
POST Method: Large Payloads - Handling of very large BlockingState payloads (TC16).
POST Method: Validation - Validation of required headers and input fields (TC06, TC09, TC10, TC11).
POST Method: Server Error Handling - Service unavailability and dependency failures (TC17, TC28).
POST Method: Authorization - Handling of invalid/missing authentication tokens (TC18).

Regression/Integration/Performance/Accessibility Coverage - Includes regression tests (TC23, TC24), integration tests (TC28, TC29), performance tests (TC25, TC26, TC27), and accessibility test (TC30).
gaps: Duplicate Submission: No idempotency/duplicate-submission test for POST present.
Rate Limiting: No tests for rate limiting/throttling.
Caching Behavior: No tests for caching headers or ETag on POST responses.
500 Internal Server Error path: No explicit test for 500 Internal Server Error (only 502/503 observed).
Forbidden/403: No tests verifying access with insufficient permissions (403).
recommendations: Add a dedicated test for idempotency/duplicate-submission handling to ensure safe retries.
Introduce rate-limiting tests to verify throttling behavior under burst traffic.
Add caching headers validation (ETag/Cache-Control) if applicable to POST responses.
Add a test simulating 500 Internal Server Error to ensure proper fallback/error handling and messaging.
Add a 403 Forbidden scenario to validate proper permissions checks.
